examInfo.title: प्रदेश लोक सेवा आयोग, मधेश प्रदेश
examInfo.subtitle: शून्यनियरिङ्ग सेवा, सिभिल समूह, जनरल, हाइवे, स्यानिटरी, ईग्रेसेन उपसमूह अधिकृत सातों तहको खुला समावेशी र अन्दर सेवा प्रतियोगितात्मक लिखित परीक्षा
examInfo.subject: Technical subject

instructions: निम्न प्रश्नहरुको उत्तर Section अनुसार छुट्टाई उत्तरपुस्तिकामा लेख्नुपर्नेछ, अन्यथा उत्तरपुस्तिका रहे नेतृत्व ।

questions.question: Explain the process of standard penetration test during soil exploration.
What are the main risks involved in bridge construction?

Distinguish between the 'Initial Load Test' and the 'Routine Load Test' for piles. Using the load-settlement curve, explain the 'Cyclic Load Test' method used to separate the skin friction from the end bearing component.
subquestions: Explain the concept of skin friction
How does cyclic loading help in separation?
